Functions.html#/c:(cm)create.name: create()
Functions.html#/c:(cm)create.abstract: create generates new public/private key pair, storing the private key in the keychain and returning the Base64

Functions.html#/c:(cm)signWithMsg:pk:.name: sign(msg:pk:)
Functions.html#/c:(cm)signWithMsg:pk:.abstract: sign returns Base64 encoded signature for data (msg) by looked up private key via keychain from public key (pk)
